issue.title: Can you check contacts for cable joints too?

content.raw:
I pulled to the right and the cable was pulled from my grasp.  My grasp is decent, so that was a non zero amount of force, but my grasp is not awesome, so it wasn't necessarily a ton of force.

And I can generally maneuver the cable; it is workable.  But it is often surprising in how it binds.
content.html:
I pulled to the right and the cable was pulled from my grasp. My grasp is decent, so that was a non zero amount of force, but my grasp is not awesome, so it wasn't necessarily a ton of force.

And I can generally maneuver the cable; it is workable. But it is often surprising in how it binds.
